headline: Fortinet (FTNT) Stock Sinks As Market Gains: Here's Why
summary: In the latest trading session, Fortinet (FTNT) closed at $100.2, marking a -6.92% move from the previous day.

headline: S&P 500 and Nasdaq Hit Records in Broad Rally
summary: The S&P 500 rode a broad market rally, supercharged by artificial intelligence stocks, to join the Nasdaq Composite in marking a record close on Thursday.  The Nasdaq built on yesterday’s record with a gain of 0.1%.  The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 192 points, or 0.4%, to get within striking distance of its Dec. 4 record.

headline: Middle East Cybersecurity Market Forecast Report 2025-2030 | Digital Transformation, State-Sponsored Threats, Regulatory Pressures, and the Rise of AI-Powered Attacks
summary: The Middle East cybersecurity market is predicted to grow from USD 16.75 billion in 2025 to USD 26.04 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 9.2%, driven by Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030 and a burgeoning startup ecosystem. As the region undergoes rapid digital transformation, cloud technology adoption intensifies, strengthening cybersecurity frameworks.
